channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1343; 05:55PM; 10816 W Blix St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IgAvpF; Toluca Lake; Firefighters responded to the front unit of a one story duplex with smoke reported from an oven fire. 34 firefighters took 10 mins to extinguish flames contained to the oven/stove and immediate area surrounding the appliance. No extension. No reported injuries, Cause under investigation. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 BC5 E102 E260 E289 E76 E86 RA76 RA86 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Structure Fire; INC#1343; 05:42PM; 10816 W Blix St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IgAvpF; Toluca Lake; One story duplex with smoke showing, units in offensive mode.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 BC5 E102 E260 E289 E76 E86 RA76 RA86 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Reported Smoke; INC#0833; 12:58PM; 4251 N Beeman Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O5GBx4; Studio City; Light smoke showing from backyard of a one story single family dwelling. Units on scene are in investigation mode.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E108 E278 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0102; 02:59AM; 705 E Broadway Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/433sI8j; #Venice; Firefighters responded to a two-story home under construction to find heavy fire showing. Firefighters engaged in a defensive attack (from the exterior only). Crews found hazardous electrical wires down in the rear. Hose lines were advanced around the perimeter of the fire and firefighters used a "surround and drown" tactic. The first 45 firefighters to arrive took 31 minutes to extinguish the blaze. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E263 E269 E292 E295 E37 E462 E59 E63 E67 E88 E95 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA5 RA63 RA862 SQ95 T5 T63 T69 T92 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0102; 02:28AM; 705 E Broadway Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/433sI8j; #Venice; PRELIM: Two-story home under construction with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM20 CM22 E263 E269 E292 E462 E59 E63 E67 EM9 RA63 RA862 T63 T69 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0747; 12:16PM; 10237 N Silverton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3URc3mf; #Tujunga; **Corrected Address** Firefighters responded to a two-story descending hillside home with smoke showing. Crews made entry, advancing hose lines, and found fire on the lower floor (floor Sub-1). The first 34 firefighters extinguished the flames in 23 minutes. Sadly, one person was found dead at the scene. Paramedics provided assessment, care, and hospital transport for one other person with symptoms of smoke inhalation. LAPD Inc #2383. Cause under investigation. PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route, ETA 1:20 PM.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 AR22 AR27 AR34 BC12 BC14 BC2 CM40 CM42 E239 E24 E274 E287 E289 E298 E77 E88 E89 E91 E98 EA1 EM11 EM14 EM5 HR3 RA74 RA77 RA98 SO1 SQ87 T39 T74 T87 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0747; 11:53AM; 10231 N Silverton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VcxoXN; #Tujunga; PRELIM: Two-story hillside home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 BC2 E24 E274 E298 E77 E89 E98 EM5 RA74 RA77 RA98 T74 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0337; 07:51AM; 2219 S Orange Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UViPaS; #MidCity; Firefighters arrived at a one-story single-family home to find heavy smoke showing from the attic. Crews forced entry into the home, to find their movement impeded by excessive storage inside. Ventilation crews cut holes in the roof and discovered the majority of the fire was in the attic. They advanced hose lines up onto the roof, and extinguish the bulk of the fire from above, through holes they made in the roof. Firefighters performed a primary search of the structure, and did not find any occupants inside. Ultimately, it took 32 firefighters 27 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E261 E294 E34 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 SO1 T61 T94; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0337; 07:24AM; 2219 S Orange Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UViPaS; #MidCity; One-story home with heavy smoke showing.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E261 E294 E34 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 T61 T94; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision with Entrapment 02/25/2024 INC#0684

item.description: Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0684; 12:40PM; 18153 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wBrRiS; #Reseda; Firefighters responded to a traffic collision involving at least 4 vehicles (plus 2 additional parked vehicles impacted) and a sheared hydrant. Upon arrival, firefighters found that one trapped patient was deceased (left in place for law enforcement investigation and medical examiner), and two others were in need of extrication. Crews used hydraulic rescue tools (similar to "Jaws of Life") to free both trapped patients from one vehicle. An additional 8 patients were involved, but not trapped. Firefighter-Paramedics evaluated a total of 11 patients (including the deceased). Six patients were transported to area hospitals, and four declined transport by LAFD ambulance. Firefighters successfully shut down the hydrant after extricating the trapped patients. LAPD Inc #2049. Nothing further; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E100 E103 E239 E273 E293 E73 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA70 RA73 RA83 RA872 RA889 RA903 RA93 T39 T73 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
